column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I had a crazy macaroon craving
column2: and really really wanted one stat.  After seeing endless check ins at Common Bond
column4: I decided to go check it out on Sunday.  In the afternoon there was a line
column5: but it seemed to move fairly quick.  The place was packed with curious hipsters
column7: and people getting their own carb and sugar rush.
